name: Mojave Rescue
description:
Mojave Rescue

Description

The Mojave Rangers are looking for a recruit and in the middle of the test they receive a call of an injured hiker roaming the Desert. They decide to let you find them in order to see if you meet the requirements. They warn you about passing out from heat exposure and will call off the search if they see signs of overheating.

The Car you’ll use is an old Jeep the rangers use for supplies runs. It’s a bit rusty but it’s a great off-road vehicle and shouldn’t have any problems except the AC doesn’t work. You’ll need to keep track of how long you’re out in the sun for since the heat will start affecting your vision.

 

Developers

Jacob Letko - Programmer

Evan Knebel - Programmer

Patrick Boyd - Vehicle Artist

Brandon Gonzalez-Rivera – Character Artist

Jake Evans - Environment Artist

Colton Greer - Environment Artist

 

Install

Installation instructions:

Extract the files by right clicking the downloaded file and choosing extract here. Make sure the .exe file and Data folder is in the same location.

Run the .exe file.

Choose settings, then press play.
